requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.5 or above
  • Processor: Quad-core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD* graphics card with at least 1GB of RAM and OpenGL 3.2 support. Display with 1680 x 1050 pixel resolution.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *Displacement preview is currently only available on the cards and drivers that support OpenGL 4.0 or newer. IMPORTANT MARI indie GPU REQUIREMENTS: MARI indie works best on non-integrated graphics cards and requires the latest available drivers in order to work correctly. MARI indie GPU requirements will likely experience problems with integrated graphics cards such as the Intel 3000-5000. Please ensure that your GPU is capable of supporting OpenGL 3.2 or above, with at least 1GB of GPU RAM and the latest release drivers installed. Internet connection required to access Steam.

Minimum:
  • OS: Window 7 64-bit, or above

  • Graphics: NVIDIA or AMD* graphics card with at least 1GB of RAM and OpenGL 3.2 support. Display with 1680 x 1050 pixel resolution.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

IMPORTANT MARI indie GPU REQUIREMENTS: MARI indie works best on non-integrated graphics cards and requires the latest available drivers in order to work correctly. MARI indie GPU requirements will likely experience problems with integrated graphics cards such as the Intel 3000-5000. Please ensure that your GPU is capable of supporting OpenGL 3.2 or above, with at least 1GB of GPU RAM and the latest release drivers installed. Internet connection required to access Steam.
